      • getFeaturesByGeneralityScoreRank

        public static com.ofergivoli.ojavalib.data_structures.set.SafeSet<java.lang.String> getFeaturesByGeneralityScoreRank(int numberOfFeaturesToReturn,
                                                                                                                     java.nio.file.Path featureGeneralityScoresXml)
        Parameters:
        numberOfFeaturesToReturn - In case this argument is greater than the number of features in the relevant input file, all the features in the input file are returned.
        Returns:
        the features with highest generality scores. Deterministic.

      • writeFeatureGeneralityScores

        Parameters:
        inDomainExperimentsParentDirectory - can contain multiple experiments for the same domain (e.g. for the two train/dev splits).
        outputDirectory - must not already exist.

      • writeFeatureGeneralityAnalysis

        public static void writeFeatureGeneralityAnalysis(com.ofergivoli.ojavalib.data_structures.map.SafeMap<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<java.lang.String,il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.core.dataset.Domain>,java.lang.Double> featureAndDomainToWeight,
                                                  il.ac.technion.nlp.nli.core.dataset.DatasetDomains datasetDomains,
                                                  java.nio.file.Path outputCsvFile)
        Writes to 'outputCsvFile' an overall analysis about the generality of all features: For each subset of domains, we get a list of features that appear in that subset.
        Parameters:
        outputCsvFile - directories on path may either already exist or not.
